title: Colin Berry Trumps the Daily Express Headline Writer

title: Colin Berry Trumps the Daily Express Headline Writer
post:
What I hadn’t spotted until reading Dan’s link to the article (to check it was functioning, oh we of little faith) was that it goes on to refer to the 2015 Exposition and the continuing controversy over you-know-what. 
Please don’t let there be another more statistically rigorous C-14 dating any time soon. That would/could really put a damper on things. Dan Porter would be left taking the dog for longer and longer walks.
author: Colin Berry
